abstract: The principles of fitness training are well known and widely available online, but some people still want a personal coach.
snippet: The principles of fitness training are well known and widely available online, but some people still want a personal coach.
lead_paragraph: In the latest Personal Best column, Gina Kolata writes about her own experience with a personal running coach, and why some people prefer to go it alone.

headline.main: Do You Need a Fitness Coach?
